name: Alterline: Mission Berlin
description:
Its 1942. You are an American soldier dropped in Berlin to complete a mission for your leader. The goal is to find and destroy their new Tiger 1 tank prototype. Goodluck!

This game was made in 1 day by me(DragL)

playtime is around 30 minutes depending on your skill level.(it's supposed to be really hard)

donations are always welcome!
